articles.title: Europe’s 1st mission to Mars ‘could be delayed until 2028’ because of Ukraine invasion, scientist claim... - The Irish Sun
articles.content:
A MAJOR Mars mission to find out whether life ever existed on the planet could be delayed by up to six years at best, as Europe scrambles to replace Russian parts.

articles.title: Russian, Ukrainian ballet performers raise funds in Dance For Ukraine charity event - CNA
